events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and the package still hasn't arrived. I am very concerned about this significant shipping delay.
System categorized the reported issue as a Delivery Delay based on the customer's concern about shipping time and package arrival.
Support agent John Doe has been assigned to handle the delivery delay case for further investigation and support.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear your package hasn’t arrived yet. I’m here to help you track it down.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have so I can check the current shipping status for you?
Sure, my order number is #123456789 and the tracking number given was ZX987654321, but it hasn’t updated in days.
I’ve contacted the carrier and submitted an inquiry to locate your package urgently. We expect an update within 48 hours and will expedite delivery once found.
Thank you for the quick response and for taking action. I appreciate your help and look forward to the update.
We’ve confirmed your package was located and is now en route with expedited shipping. You should receive it within the next 24 hours.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your package and that everything is in order. Please let us know if there is anything more we can do.
Yes, the package arrived yesterday and all items are intact. Thank you for resolving this so quickly.
The case regarding the delivery delay has been formally closed following the successful receipt of the package by the customer.
